ComicInfo.Summary: Walking Spanish Down the Hall; (Sanctuary Book Four: Strange Days - Chapter Five: After a tantalizing dream glimpse of what we missed between v1#20 and v2#1, Parintachin shows up to warn Lusiphur that he needs to leave Sanctuary, now. And strap a gun to the small of his back. But before he can leave, he's "arrested" and held for trial.
